mapper.insert:
insert into design_plan_comment
user_id, design_plan_id, content, discussionprogram, date, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, att1, att2, numa1, numa2, remark,
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{designPlanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discussionprogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
SELECT d.*, u.nick_name,u.pic_id AS pic FROM design_plan_comment d LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON d.user_id = u.id and u.is_deleted = 0 WHERE 1=1 and d.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and design_plan_id = #{designPlanId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and d.discussionprogram like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{discussionprogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and d.gmt_create between #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{tomorrow,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and u.user_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
ORDER BY d.gmt_create DESC

SELECT u.user_name AS userName,u.pic_id AS pic, d.content AS content, d.discussionprogram AS discussionprogram, d.date AS date,d.id AS id FROM design_plan_comment d LEFT JOIN sys_user u on d.user_id = u.id and u.is_deleted = 0 WHERE d.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
